title: Column icons not visible when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database with the following details:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Dataset window, select Query.
6. [Missing details. Please provide the remaining steps to reproduce the issue.]
